title: Blaze away
creator_credit: Pathe Melody Comedies and Hal Roach
brief_description: A silent slapstick comedy set in the wild West. An easterner goes west and gets the job as the local sheriff. He manages to capture the villain and then lock himself up! Starring Paul Parrott and Jobyna Ralston.
description: A silent slapstick comedy set in the wild West. An easterner goes west and gets the job as the local sheriff. He manages to capture the villain and then lock himself up! Starring Paul Parrott and Jobyna Ralston.
